targets.query:
from(bucket: "crypto-data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "crypto_market")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "market_cap")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.crypto !~ /^test_/ and r.crypto != "None")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.crypto =~ /^${crypto:regex}$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> fill(usePrevious: true)
  |> group(columns: ["_time"])
  |> sum(column: "_value")
  |> group()

from(bucket: "crypto-data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "crypto_market")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "volume_24h")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.crypto !~ /^test_/ and r.crypto != "None")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.crypto =~ /^${crypto:regex}$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> fill(usePrevious: true)
  |> group(columns: ["_time"])
  |> sum(column: "_value")
  |> group()

from(bucket: "crypto-data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "crypto_market")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "price_usd")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.crypto !~ /^test_/ and r.crypto != "None")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.crypto =~ /^${crypto:regex}$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "price_usd")

from(bucket: "crypto-data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "crypto_market")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "price_usd")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.crypto !~ /^test_/ and r.crypto != "None")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.crypto =~ /^${crypto:regex}$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "price_usd")

from(bucket: "crypto-data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "crypto_market")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "volume_24h")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.crypto !~ /^test_/ and r.crypto != "None")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.crypto =~ /^${crypto:regex}$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "volume_24h")

from(bucket: "crypto-data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "crypto_market")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "market_cap")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.crypto !~ /^test_/ and r.crypto != "None")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.crypto =~ /^${crypto:regex}$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> fill(usePrevious: true)
  |> yield(name: "market_cap")

p = from(bucket: "crypto-data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStop - 24h, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "crypto_market" and r._field == "price_usd")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.crypto !~ /^test_/ and r.crypto != "None")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.crypto =~ /^${crypto:regex}$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

p0 = p |> group(columns: ["crypto"]) |> first() |> rename(columns: {_value: "p0"}) |> keep(columns: ["crypto", "p0"])
p1 = p |> group(columns: ["crypto"]) |> last()  |> rename(columns: {_value: "p1"}) |> keep(columns: ["_time", "crypto", "p1"])
join(tables: {a: p1, b: p0}, on: ["crypto"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: if r.p0 == 0.0 then 0.0 else (r.p1 - r.p0) / r.p0 * 100.0 }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "crypto"])

list.name: crypto
list.query:
import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"
schema.tagValues(bucket: "crypto-data", tag: "crypto", predicate: (r) => r._measurement == "crypto_market", start: -90d)
